Uses of Package
glg2d

  • Packages that use glg2d 
    Package Description
    glg2d  
    glg2d.shaders  
  • Classes in glg2d used by glg2d 
    Class and Description
    FastLineVisitor
    Draws a line using the native GL implementation of a line.
    FillSimpleConvexPolygonVisitor
    Fills a simple convex polygon.
    G2DDrawingHelper
    Assists in the drawing of a particular aspect of the Graphics2D object.
    G2DGLCanvas
    This canvas redirects all paints to an OpenGL canvas.
    G2DGLEventListener
    Helps wrap the GLGraphics2D object within the JOGL framework.
    G2DGLImageDrawer
    Draws images for the GLGraphics2D class.
    G2DGLImageDrawer.TextureCache 
    G2DGLPanel
    This panel redirects all paints to an OpenGL canvas.
    G2DGLShapeDrawer
    Draws shapes for the GLGraphics2D class.
    G2DGLSimpleEventListener
    Helps wrap the GLGraphics2D object within the JOGL framework and paints the component fully for each display.
    G2DGLStringDrawer
    Draws text for the GLGraphics2D class.
    G2DGLStringDrawer.FontRenderCache 
    GLGraphics2D
    Implements the standard Graphics2D functionality, but instead draws to an OpenGL canvas.
    LineDrawingVisitor
    Draws a line, as outlined by a BasicStroke.
    PathVisitor
    Receives the calls from a PathIterator and draws the shape as it is visited.
    PolygonOrTesselatingVisitor
    Tesselating is expensive.
    SimplePathVisitor
    This is a fast Bézier curve implementation.
    VertexBuffer
    Wraps a simple FloatBuffer and makes it easier to push 2-D vertices into the buffer and then draw them using any mode desired.
  • Classes in glg2d used by glg2d.shaders 
    Class and Description
    G2DDrawingHelper
    Assists in the drawing of a particular aspect of the Graphics2D object.
    G2DGLImageDrawer
    Draws images for the GLGraphics2D class.
    G2DGLShapeDrawer
    Draws shapes for the GLGraphics2D class.
    G2DGLStringDrawer
    Draws text for the GLGraphics2D class.
    GLGraphics2D
    Implements the standard Graphics2D functionality, but instead draws to an OpenGL canvas.
    PathVisitor
    Receives the calls from a PathIterator and draws the shape as it is visited.
